name: LIGHTKEEPER (ArBe)
description:
This is a game I made for Alakajam 12.

I found out the jam was happening after a day had already passed. I also gave up on my entry midway through and slept a good 8 hours before deciding to finish it, so all in all this is the product of  ~11 hours of work.

What I'm trying to say is, please excuse the graphics being made up entirely out of placeholders, and the overall simple gameplay loop. I had planned to implement some wave and upgrade mechanics, but didn't make it in time.

I also wish I'd had time to do some audio, but alas, this abomination shall join my ever-growing collection of silent jam games.

This game is based on cumt, an engine/framework thing I wrote.
